item.title: Common Voice Armenia Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Common Voice Armenia FAQs ðŸ”—What is Common Voice Armenia? ðŸ”—Common Voice Armenia is a subcommunity of Common Voice , an initiative/project by Mozilla Firefox to help teach machines how people speak. Common Voice invites all languages to join the community provided that contributors follow Mozilla’s playbook. The main moving part of Common Voice is getting people to donate their time and voices so that anyone would be able to download a voice corpus filtered by language.
